nodes.label: Anduril Industries
nodes.description: Private U.S. defense technology company founded in 2017; develops autonomous defense systems and mission autonomy software.

nodes.label: Palmer Luckey
nodes.description: Co‑founder of Anduril; previously founded Oculus VR. Public face of the company and key product visionary.

nodes.label: Trae Stephens
nodes.description: Co‑founder and executive chairman of Anduril; also a partner at Founders Fund, connecting the company to Peter Thiel’s VC network.

nodes.label: Matt Grimm
nodes.description: Co‑founder and executive at Anduril, involved in operations and scaling the business.

nodes.label: Joe Chen
nodes.description: Co‑founder of Anduril; early leader in product and engineering.

nodes.label: Brian Schimpf
nodes.description: Co‑founder and CEO of Anduril; previously at Palantir; responsible for day‑to‑day leadership and strategy.

nodes.label: Founders Fund
nodes.description: Venture capital firm co‑founded by Peter Thiel; seeded Anduril and has led multiple large rounds including Series F and Series G.

nodes.label: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z)
nodes.description: Major Silicon Valley VC firm; investor in several Anduril rounds, including early growth stages.

nodes.label: General Catalyst
nodes.description: Venture capital firm backing Anduril across multiple rounds as the company scaled.

nodes.label: 8VC
nodes.description: Venture capital firm focused on technology and national‑security‑related startups; early investor in Anduril.

nodes.label: Lux Capital
nodes.description: VC firm investing in deep tech and defense; participated in Anduril’s later funding rounds.

nodes.label: Valor Equity Partners
nodes.description: Growth‑equity firm that led or co‑led major Anduril rounds, including Series E.

nodes.label: Sands Capital
nodes.description: Public and private markets investor; co‑led or joined Anduril’s later mega‑rounds.

nodes.label: Fidelity
nodes.description: Large asset‑management firm; participated in later Anduril growth rounds as an institutional investor.

nodes.label: Baillie Gifford
nodes.description: Long‑term public and private investor; took a position in Anduril in late‑stage VC rounds.

nodes.label: Altimeter Capital
nodes.description: Technology‑focused investment firm; joined Anduril’s later funding rounds.

nodes.label: D1 Capital Partners
nodes.description: Crossover hedge fund / VC investor; participated in Anduril growth financing.

nodes.label: Peter Thiel
nodes.description: Co‑founder of Founders Fund and Palantir; influential early backer of Anduril via Founders Fund.

nodes.label: Elad Gil
nodes.description: Angel and VC investor; led Anduril’s large Series D round and helped bring in multiple top‑tier funds.

nodes.label: J.D. Vance
nodes.description: U.S. politician and investor; reported as a personal investor in Anduril through venture connections.

nodes.label: Employees & Other Shareholders
nodes.description: Includes Anduril employees with equity and other smaller or undisclosed investors; exact ownership percentages are private.
